00055 extern  code S_usb_user_configuration_descriptor usb_conf_desc;

00077 // ____ T Y P E  D E F I N I T I O N _______________________________________
00078 
00079 typedef struct
00080 {
00081    U32 dwDTERate;
00082    U8 bCharFormat;
00083    U8 bParityType;
00084    U8 bDataBits;
00085 }S_line_coding;
00086 
00087 // type for set control line state message
00088 // cdc spec 1.1 chapter 6.2.14
00089 typedef union
00090 {
00091    U8 all;
00092    struct {
00093       U8 DTR:1;
00094       U8 RTS:1;
00095       U8 unused:6;
00096    };
00097 }S_line_status;
00098 
00099 // type for hardware handshake support 
00100 // cdc spec 1.1 chapter 6.3.5
00101 typedef union
00102 {
00103    U16 all;
00104    struct {
00105       U16 bDCD:1;
00106       U16 bDSR:1;
00107       U16 bBreak:1;
00108       U16 bRing:1;
00109       U16 bFraming:1;
00110       U16 bParity:1;
00111       U16 bOverRun:1;
00112       U16 reserved:9;
00113    };
00114 }S_serial_state;
